name: ocular-website-gatsby
description: A website for Ocular, built with Ocular (Gatsby version)

scripts.start: yarn copy-examples && yarn clean && yarn develop
scripts.publish-docs: yarn build && mkdir -p ../../docs && rm -rf ../../docs/*  && mv public/* ../../docs
scripts.copy-examples: rm -rf examples ; find ../examples -name node_modules -exec rm -r {} \; ; cp -r ../examples .
